content.question: In the third sentence of the fourth paragraph (“I sat . . . beast”), the narrator likens his heart to a hammer in order to convey the intense

choices.label: determination to understand how the autoclave works
brokenheartedness in knowing he will never meet his mother
gratitude and awe at how his experiences have shaped him
fear and excitement as he sits where his mother sat

content.answer: fear and excitement as he sits where his mother sat
